title: I dont see how players die so much
body:
I make flash plays I dive people but I never die because I think about every outcome before I actually do said option. Im always the highest kda on the team no matter the role yet I see people who die 10x a game lmao. Sure I die "alot" on my not so much played champions like 4 deaths a game but its still not 5+ ever. If you want to win games that is what you should strive for good calculated plays and continuing to snowball your lead.
https://gyazo.com/ce06aabce672221dd787eebcf27caa6e  kda's
https://gyazo.com/ed2baf1ec8982c7527812b31049f8d34 Champions. Both in same order so just match the two and its tkush jungle with like 2 toplane games of him. Oh and like half the games of teemo are jungle as well but tops easier :P

replies.body: This seems a tad fishy. That account used to make this post isn't the same one used in the kda na.op.gg pics.  Wouldn't it be easier to just link the na.op.gg page and let us see the kda?
How is it "fishy" just because I have an old id logged on and too lazy to switch over? And no people are lazy so taking two seconds to screenshot works better for everyone.

Um, i didnt catched anything fishy before this comment.
But: you're lazy to change accounts but you're not lazy on taking the screenshots, trim them and upload them...
How does that work?
This post makes it sound like there is some cover up lol!
I'm just a tad skeptical that's all.  Btw can I get that na.op.gg link then?
Well, the answer is simple yet frustrating. Teammates doesnt seem to think plays as much as you do.

its just super simple things. Like last game I played reksai I went 12-1-12 in a plat 2 game. Everyone else in the game died atleast 5 times. All I did was kill people that were low when I knew it was safe to do so or gank when it was safe to do so and just got out when I noticed its safe to do so.

Too many people just undervalue a minimap and just rush things instead of just clear headed thinking.
